parameters.query:
-- Daily Analytics Summary
SELECT 
  -- Prospect Metrics
  COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE(created_at) = CURRENT_DATE THEN 1 END) as prospects_today,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE(created_at) >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days' THEN 1 END) as prospects_7days,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE(created_at) >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days' THEN 1 END) as prospects_30days,
  
  -- Prospect Sources
  COUNT(CASE WHEN lead_source = 'google_maps' AND DATE(created_at) = CURRENT_DATE THEN 1 END) as google_prospects_today,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN lead_source = 'linkedin_alternative' AND DATE(created_at) = CURRENT_DATE THEN 1 END) as linkedin_prospects_today,
  
  -- Prospect Types
  COUNT(CASE WHEN prospect_type = 'automotive' AND DATE(created_at) = CURRENT_DATE THEN 1 END) as automotive_today,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN prospect_type = 'restaurant' AND DATE(created_at) = CURRENT_DATE THEN 1 END) as restaurant_today,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN prospect_type = 'legal' AND DATE(created_at) = CURRENT_DATE THEN 1 END) as legal_today,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN prospect_type = 'medical' AND DATE(created_at) = CURRENT_DATE THEN 1 END) as medical_today,
  
  -- Quality Metrics
  AVG(CASE WHEN DATE(created_at) = CURRENT_DATE THEN lead_score END) as avg_score_today,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN lead_score >= 70 AND DATE(created_at) = CURRENT_DATE THEN 1 END) as high_score_today,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN is_premium_area = TRUE AND DATE(created_at) = CURRENT_DATE THEN 1 END) as premium_area_today,
  
  -- Contact Status
  COUNT(CASE WHEN contacted = TRUE THEN 1 END) as total_contacted,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN meeting_booked = TRUE THEN 1 END) as total_meetings_booked,
  
  -- Pipeline Status
  COUNT(CASE WHEN pipeline_stage = 'new' THEN 1 END) as new_prospects,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN pipeline_stage = 'contacted' THEN 1 END) as contacted_prospects,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN pipeline_stage = 'meeting_scheduled' THEN 1 END) as meeting_scheduled,
  
  -- Timestamp
  CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as report_timestamp
FROM prospects 
WHERE is_active = TRUE AND deleted_at IS NULL;

-- Email Campaign Analytics
SELECT 
  -- Today's Email Activity
  COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE(sent_at) = CURRENT_DATE THEN 1 END) as emails_sent_today,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE(opened_at) = CURRENT_DATE THEN 1 END) as emails_opened_today,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE(clicked_at) = CURRENT_DATE THEN 1 END) as emails_clicked_today,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE(replied_at) = CURRENT_DATE THEN 1 END) as emails_replied_today,
  
  -- 7-Day Email Performance
  COUNT(CASE WHEN sent_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days' THEN 1 END) as emails_sent_7days,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN opened_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days' THEN 1 END) as emails_opened_7days,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN clicked_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days' THEN 1 END) as emails_clicked_7days,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN replied_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days' THEN 1 END) as emails_replied_7days,
  
  -- Email Types Performance (Last 7 Days)
  COUNT(CASE WHEN email_type = 'initial_outreach' AND sent_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days' THEN 1 END) as initial_outreach_7days,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN email_type = 'follow_up_1' AND sent_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days' THEN 1 END) as follow_up_1_7days,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN email_type = 'meeting_confirmation' AND sent_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days' THEN 1 END) as confirmations_7days,
  
  -- Conversion Rates (Last 30 Days)
  ROUND(
    COUNT(CASE WHEN opened_at IS NOT NULL AND sent_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days' THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / 
    NULLIF(COUNT(CASE WHEN sent_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days' THEN 1 END), 0), 2
  ) as open_rate_30days,
  
  ROUND(
    COUNT(CASE WHEN clicked_at IS NOT NULL AND sent_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days' THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / 
    NULLIF(COUNT(CASE WHEN sent_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days' THEN 1 END), 0), 2
  ) as click_rate_30days,
  
  ROUND(
    COUNT(CASE WHEN replied_at IS NOT NULL AND sent_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days' THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / 
    NULLIF(COUNT(CASE WHEN sent_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days' THEN 1 END), 0), 2
  ) as reply_rate_30days,
  
  -- Timestamp
  CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as report_timestamp
FROM email_campaigns;

-- Meeting & Calendly Analytics
SELECT 
  -- Today's Meeting Activity
  COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE(start_time) = CURRENT_DATE THEN 1 END) as meetings_today,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE(created_at) = CURRENT_DATE THEN 1 END) as bookings_today,
  
  -- 7-Day Meeting Activity
  COUNT(CASE WHEN start_time >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days' THEN 1 END) as meetings_7days,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN created_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days' THEN 1 END) as bookings_7days,
  
  -- Meeting Types (Last 7 Days)
  COUNT(CASE WHEN meeting_type = 'automotive_consultation' AND created_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days' THEN 1 END) as automotive_meetings_7days,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN meeting_type = 'restaurant_consultation' AND created_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days' THEN 1 END) as restaurant_meetings_7days,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN meeting_type = 'legal_consultation' AND created_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days' THEN 1 END) as legal_meetings_7days,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN meeting_type = 'medical_consultation' AND created_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days' THEN 1 END) as medical_meetings_7days,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN meeting_type = 'general_consultation' AND created_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days' THEN 1 END) as general_meetings_7days,
  
  -- Meeting Status (All Time)
  COUNT(CASE WHEN event_status = 'scheduled' THEN 1 END) as scheduled_meetings,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN event_status = 'completed' THEN 1 END) as completed_meetings,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN event_status = 'canceled' THEN 1 END) as canceled_meetings,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN event_status = 'no_show' THEN 1 END) as no_show_meetings,
  
  -- Prospect Matching
  COUNT(CASE WHEN prospect_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as meetings_with_prospects,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN prospect_id IS NULL THEN 1 END) as meetings_without_prospects,
  
  -- Upcoming Meetings (Next 7 Days)
  COUNT(CASE WHEN start_time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP + INTERVAL '7 days' THEN 1 END) as upcoming_meetings,
  
  -- Timestamp
  CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as report_timestamp
FROM calendly_events;

-- Workflow Performance Analytics
SELECT 
  workflow_name,
  
  -- Execution Counts
  COUNT(*) as total_executions,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE(start_time) = CURRENT_DATE THEN 1 END) as executions_today,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN start_time >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days' THEN 1 END) as executions_7days,
  
  -- Success Rate
  COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'success' THEN 1 END) as successful_executions,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'error' THEN 1 END) as failed_executions,
  ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'success' THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 2) as success_rate,
  
  -- Performance Metrics
  AVG(duration_seconds) as avg_duration_seconds,
  MAX(duration_seconds) as max_duration_seconds,
  SUM(records_processed) as total_records_processed,
  AVG(records_processed) as avg_records_per_execution,
  
  -- Recent Activity
  MAX(start_time) as last_execution,
  MIN(start_time) as first_execution,
  
  -- Recent Errors
  COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'error' AND start_time >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '24 hours' THEN 1 END) as errors_24h,
  
  -- Timestamp
  CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as report_timestamp
  
FROM workflow_logs 
WHERE start_time >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days'
GROUP BY workflow_name
ORDER BY total_executions DESC;
